Author: misterladybug
Text: I’m so sorry ):   I have been craving McDonald’s forever but I know if i eat it I’m gonna want to die inside so I just stare at pictures of it online for hours which is probs even more sad   But my caloric needs are around 2500 and I want to fucking throw up imagining that much food in a day   I ate around 1200 calories yesterday and I felt like an embodiment of the mortal sin gluttony like a giant slug just slugging around leaving my fat ooze everywhere   It’s so frustrating bc I try to recover but then my scale goes up a few pounds and I feel gross eating so then I restrict for weeks and still feel gross  We can’t ever win ):
